thread.title: Amber Alert issued for endangered girl, 3, and mother
thread.title_full: Amber Alert issued for endangered girl, 3, and mother | OregonLive.com

author: Nuran Alteir | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Amber Alert issued for endangered girl, 3, and mother
text:
A 3-year-old girl is missing from Yakima City and Washington state officials have issued an Amber Alert to find her.
Kyle Arellano, 18, has been identified as a suspect in the disappearance of 3-year-old Lupita Tellez and her mother Vivianna Cruz. Washington State Police Lupita Tellez, 3, and her mother Vivianna Cruz were forced into a vehicle at about 10:15 a.m. on Tuesday, according to the Amber Alert.
Authorities have identified the suspect as Kyle Arellano. He is described as an 18-year-old man weighing 260 pounds and is 6 feet 3 inches tall. Police believe he may be driving a silver 2000 Mitsubishi Galant with the license plate No. AUP4936.
Anyone with information about this case is asked to call Washington State Police at 509-575-2320 or 911.
This post will be updated as more information becomes available.
